channel.title: Few easy steps too speeding up your computer
channel.description:
plz dont lock or delete this coz it is helpful
Anyone can do these steps they do not require opening your case!
step 1: Check your processes too do this hit alt+control+delete and click processes take a look if you have more than 25 processes and you dont know what they are you have too much crap you dont need running if you have a reason for more than 25 like me then its ok
Step 2: Look and see what processes are using alot of cpu obiously firefox.exe or iexplorer.exe are gonna be using some because hey your reading this but if you got something like 1234123451242q455145t5.exe using 80% cpu chances are you got spyware / virus and need a cleaning but if you got something like dellhelp blah blah thats unessesary and useless cuz honestly dell dosnt care about you and their customer service is garbage (another reason you should go custom :p)
Step 3: goto start run and type msconfig little window pops up goto the startup section turn off anything you dont really need if you dont know what it is leave it its better you leave it then turning off something important like a virus scanner
step 4: ok now move onto services click hide all microsoft services and proceed too uncheck things you dont need (this can be alittle tricky so if your a noob too your system please do not attempt this step)
step 5: restart your system and hopefully you get alittle bit faster
Step 6: DEFRAG - whens the last time you defragged? if its more than 2 weeks shame on you defrag it makes your pc happy so do it
Step 7: if none of these steps worked something is ill with your computer and you need too either consider upgrading / or reformatting
Hope this Helps - fury
